# gghigglight包的使用

```{r}

counts <- c(18,17,15,20,10,20,25,13,12)
outcome <- gl(3,1,9)
treatment <- gl(3,3)
data.frame(treatment, outcome, counts)
glm(counts ~ outcome + treatment, family = poisson()) %>% augment()
```
